name: Hedron Fields of Agadeem
originalText:
Creatures with power 7 or greater can't attack or block.
Whenever you roll {Chaos}, put a 7/7 colorless Eldrazi creature token with annihilator 1 onto the battlefield. (Whenever it attacks, defending player sacrifices a permanent.)

rulings.text: A creature’s power is checked when attackers or blockers are declared. Increasing the power of an attacking or blocking creature to 7 or greater won’t remove that creature from combat.
